attributes.action: Oppose the recent application to the Civil Aviation Authority to permit direct flights between London and Ercan in Occupied Northern Cyprus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Cyprus remains an occupied land whose sovereignty remains unrecognised by all nations except the occupying power, Turkey. Supporting a direct link will lend credibility to the occupation, and condoning it will ignore the human rights abuses carried out since 1974 including the forced exiling to Cyprus of Turkish Kurds.
